_header: When the nightengale sings the woods waxen green
_description: April, a love lyric — five four-line monorhyming stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
When þe nyhtegale singes þe wodes waxen greneLef ant gras
                    ant blosme springes in aueryl y wene…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Suete lemmon y preðe þe pou louie me a stoundeY
                    wole mone my song on wham þat hit ys on ylong
